Farewell New Orleans

After five amazing years of living in New Orleans I will be leaving this fair city next month. I have recently accepted an offer from Gumroad to join the team as a Product Designer and couldn't be more excited. They are helping creatives make a living online in a big way and I cannot wait begin to contribute.

This is most certainly a bittersweet goodbye and is coming somewhat unexpectedly but it is time to explore San Francisco and the tech culture there. I cannot thank enough all the wonderful friends & co-workers I have met here over the past years for their support and general awesome-ness. I wouldn't be who I am today without you all.

As of May 10th, I will be no longer be a resident of New Orleans, LA and will be on my way to San Francisco. If you're in town and want to catchup before then, shoot me an email!

If you have never heard of Gumroad I encourage you to check it out! Additionally if you're a creator, I would also love any thoughts on how Gumroad could possibly be better for you.
